overview: Fajrin was former business consultant at The Boston Consulting Group (BCG). His wide experience across many industries (Banking/Financial Services, Consumer Goods, Healthcare, IT, Retail, and Telecommunication industries) gives Suitmedia wider perspectives especially from business point of view when helping clients. His expertise also brings Suitmedia Services to business result oriented. He will make sure each of services gives the best result for clients, either operational or financial performance. He was one of Indonesian delegates in one-year student exchange program to South Korea. He is Computer Science ITB Graduate with Summa Cumlaude Honor and GPA 4.0.
